## Properties

| Property           | Attribute      | Description                     | Type        | Default     |
| ------------------ | -------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| `customClass`      | `custom-class` | Add class to iframe             | `string`    | `undefined` |
| `downloadUrl`      | `download-url` | Download url of PDF             | `string`    | `undefined` |
| `errorComponent`   | --             | Render custom error component   | `() => any` | `undefined` |
| `loadingComponent` | --             | Render custom loading component | `() => any` | `undefined` |
